\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Kirill_Kireyev?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Kirill Kireyev\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Arial\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Arial\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Adilet_Zhumaev?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Segoe UI\\\"\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hi! My name is Kirill, and I am Head of Quality Engineering discipline in Kazakhstan. I'm glad to see a new face in our big and friendly testing family.\\nIn our team you will be able to meet a lot of interesting people, strong engineers and professionals in all spheres of IT. You will have an opportunity to work together on a challenging tasks, expand borders by participating in extra activities, have fun and find new friends.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I'm pretty sure that I will also have a chance to work together with you and become more familiar. In case you will feel that you don't know what to do and where to get help - you could always contact me directly via Teams or Email.\\nMaybe you heard the phrase: think globally, act locally. So, we gather our global success from the local achievements of each of us.  \\nLet's go! It is time to show who is the testing star.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Segoe UI\\\"\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Segoe UI\\\"\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"9.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#444444\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#444444\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]}]}}"
